text: Great wings and burgers!  Service very friendly.  Have visited numerous times and have not been disappointed.
Small unassuming pub in DTW. Efficient friendly service. Food look looked fantastic. Nothing fancy, salads, sammies fried fair and cheap drinks,.

Just enjoyed a great dinner of house salad and chicken. The produce was fresh and the fixings were not overpowering. Hubby enjoyed a burger which also got high marks. Our guests enjoyed the not your mom's grilled cheese and soup. Good drinks and attentive service. Will come back to try the pasta. Give this place a try.
